answer:
The influenza vaccine may be available at that time. Use our influenza clinic finder and call to see if they have the vaccine before you leave. You also may be able to get a publicly funded influenza vaccine when you are in Alberta. Contact the public health centre where you are visiting and bring your B.C. Services card.
	Immunization Nurse
question: We are heading to Alberta on Oct. 23, 2019, and hope to get our flu shots before we go. What are our options? If we don't get them here, can we get them in Alberta?
